comments.author: Kamiru
comments.content: I am very very impressed with the photos. I am looking forward to some cool pictures when you come to Hong Kong. I didn't manage to take much striking pictures here in Borneo...which kindda sux. I will post some up in Zoto later (as always). Oh, and there is dust on my sensor, I might need to ask you to bring it back to Japan for cleaning :'(

comments.author: Randy
comments.content: Wow, that sucks... But on the bright side, it's another reason to buy a new camera sooner ;)
